doctor.name: Dr. Md. Israfil Sarkar
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Israfil Sarkar is a Urology Specialist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Urology). He is a Consultant, Urology at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Moon Hospital, Comilla. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Israfil Sarkar at Moon Hospital, Comilla is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.info: Dr. Sharif Md. Shahadat Ali Khan is a Urologist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Urology). He is a Consultant, Urology at National Institute of Kidney Diseases & Urology. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Comilla Trauma Center. Practicing hour of Dr. Sharif Md. Shahadat Ali Khan at Comilla Trauma Center is 3pm to 7pm (Thursday), 10am to 1pm (Friday).
